column4: when logged into my ubuntu server ping localhost fails any ideas/
how do you know it fails?
and do you get an error message? (thats what's important in troubleshooting)
do you run a firewall, iptables perhaps?
firewall is turned off right now
and you sure interface lo is up?
yes im logged in the machine via ssh
thats not answering the question really -- is lo reported as up in ifconfig
if i did, i wouldnt be taking you "on a ride" now, would i? :)
